DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether neoadjuvant therapy, treatment designed to be used as a first step toward shrinking the cancer and in evaluating response to drugs and other agents, was administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to neoadjuvant therapy, treatment designed to be used as a first step toward shrinking the cancer and in evaluating response to drugs and other agents, being administered.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Treatment designed to be used as a first step toward shrinking the cancer and in evaluating response to drugs and other agents. Induction therapy is followed by additional therapy to eliminate whatever cancer remains.

Concepts.definition: Therapy administered prior to the primary treatment for the purpose of making the primary treatment more effective.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.description: Prior to the resection of the tumor submitted to the BCR, did the patient receive systemic therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient receive neoadjuvant treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient initiate neoadjuvant hormonal, endocrine or vaccine therapy before surgery?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient receive neoadjuvant therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN-1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the patient completed the baseline (T0) FDG-PET/CT prior to registration, will the patient start the neoadjuvant Pertuzumab-based regimen after study registration, and within 21 days after the T0 scan?
